| High Flame Mage:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is a [human](/wiki/Human_\(monster_attribute\) "Human (monster attribute)").
* is male.
* is normally generated [peaceful](/wiki/Peaceful "Peaceful").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* can pick up [magical items](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item").
* lets you close unless attacked.
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* hits creatures as a +4 weapon. |                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                                                                                                                  |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line4846](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line4846 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

The **High Flame Mage**, @, is the [Flame Mage](/wiki/Flame_Mage "Flame Mage") [quest leader](/wiki/Quest_leader "Quest leader"). A high-level spellcaster, he is identical to the [High Ice Mage](/wiki/High_Ice_Mage "High Ice Mage"). Surprisingly, he does not resist fire.

## Proper Name Bug

Unlike other unique monsters whose names are titles (such as the [Master of Thieves](/wiki/Master_of_Thieves "Master of Thieves") and [the Oracle](/wiki/Oracle_\(monster\) "Oracle (monster)")), the High Flame Mage erroneously has the M2\_PNAME flag, which causes his name to be treated as a personal name. This leads to slightly strange messages such as "High Flame Mage casts a spell!" He shares this bug with the [High Ice Mage](/wiki/High_Ice_Mage "High Ice Mage"); however the elemental mage quest nemeses, the [Earth Mage](/wiki/Earth_Mage "Earth Mage") and the [Water Mage](/wiki/Water_Mage "Water Mage"), correctly lack the M2\_PNAME flag.

[![This article may require revision for the next version of SLASH'EM. Click here for more information.](/images/3/38/Se7e7-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article may require revision for the next version of SLASH'EM. Click here for more information.")
html:
High Flame Mage

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
@ High Flame Mage
Difficulty 24
Attacks Weapon 1d6, Weapon 1d6, Spell-casting
@ High Flame Mage
Difficulty 24
Attacks

Weapon 1d6, Weapon 1d6, Spell-casting

Base level 20
Base experience 598
Speed 12
Base AC 0
Base MR 40
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) Unique
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size Medium
Resistances poison
Resistances conveyed poison (100%)

High Flame Mage:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is male.
  • is normally generated peaceful.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • lets you close unless attacked.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • hits creatures as a +4 weapon.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line4846

The High Flame Mage, @, is the Flame Mage quest leader. A high-level spellcaster, he is identical to the High Ice Mage. Surprisingly, he does not resist fire.

Proper Name Bug

Unlike other unique monsters whose names are titles (such as the Master of Thieves and the Oracle), the High Flame Mage erroneously has the M2_PNAME flag, which causes his name to be treated as a personal name. This leads to slightly strange messages such as "High Flame Mage casts a spell!" He shares this bug with the High Ice Mage; however the elemental mage quest nemeses, the Earth Mage and the Water Mage, correctly lack the M2_PNAME flag.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=High_Flame_Mage&oldid=168280"

The {{questmon|High Flame Mage|Flame Mage|leader}} A high-level spellcaster, he is identical to the [[High Ice Mage]]. Surprisingly, he does not resist fire.

==Proper Name Bug==
Unlike other unique monsters whose names are titles (such as the [[Master of Thieves]] and [[Oracle (monster)|the Oracle]]), the High Flame Mage erroneously has the M2_PNAME flag, which causes his name to be treated as a personal name.  This leads to slightly strange messages such as "High Flame Mage casts a spell!"  He shares this bug with the [[High Ice Mage]]; however the elemental mage quest nemeses, the [[Earth Mage]] and the [[Water Mage]], correctly lack the M2_PNAME flag.
